Phrase.Text:
You horrible monsters! The enslavement of my people will not be allowed.
Our final world will not succumb to your vile brotherhood.
Pleasse, [YourLeaderName], leave our worldsss in peace. We mean your alliance no harm.
Pleasse, [YourLeaderName], leave our worldsss in peace. We mean your alliance no harm.
Greetings, brother in arms. The final Drath world is ripe for our taking. Troops from the Korath Clan are here to help you deal with these...lesser creatures.
Brother, the foul [OtherEmpireName] already have a surprising counter-force mustered. Is there any help you can provide our military?
